title: Fmr. NEC Director: Jobs Report Delay is ‘Puzzling'
description: Gene Sperling, former National Economic Council Director under Presidents Clinton and Obama and President of Sperling Economic Strategies, says the delay adds to uncertainty at a time when the labor market is already being interpreted in very different ways. He speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
